attributes.action: Reduce the content of A-levels for next years exams
attributes.additional_details: Whilst this may be something that Parliament would consider next year, I want to urge them to take action now, to prevent an unnecessary amount overwhelming stress for current Year 12 students.
attributes.background: Reducing the A-level content for next years exams would relieve a huge amount of pressure for current Year 12 students. We have missed a considerable amount of school and it is unreasonable to expect us to take exams normally under these circumstances.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
